int main() {

int main() {
   0:   55                      push   rbp
   1:   48 89 e5                mov    rbp,rsp
  int a = 1;
   4:   c7 45 fc 01 00 00 00    mov    DWORD PTR [rbp-0x4],0x1
  int b = 2;
   b:   c7 45 f8 02 00 00 00    mov    DWORD PTR [rbp-0x8],0x2

  1c:   89 45 f8                mov    DWORD PTR [rbp-0x8],eax

  int b = 2;

   0:   55                      push   rbp

   int a = 1;
   4:   c7 45 fc 01 00 00 00    mov    DWORD PTR [rbp-0x4],0x1
   int b = 2;
   b:   c7 45 f8 02 00 00 00    mov    DWORD PTR [rbp-0x8],0x2
   a = b + a;

   b = a + b;
